title: Project-Based Mathematics Learning Design and Technology Integration Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and fundamental algebraic concepts
context.additional_context: A course aimed at strengthening practitioners' mathematical problem-solving skills in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, with project tasks structured around real-world cases encountered in daily work

learning_goals: Learners can analyze work-related math problems using a structured PBL (Problem-Based Learning) approach and derive solutions.
Learners can visualize and share math learning design models using smartphone-based tools.
Learners can collaboratively design effective math learning activities considering constraints of technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
